info.title: Ginga Tek Task Management API
info.description: A comprehensive task management system with REST API endpoints

post.description: Login user and return access token

get.description: Get all users (Admin only)

schema.title: Response Get Users Api V1 Users  Get

get.description: Get user by ID
Get current user info

Get all projects with enhanced filtering and optional expanded details

Parameters:
- show_closed: If True, includes finished/archived projects. If False, shows only active projects
- status: Filter by specific project status (active, completed, archived)
- expand: Include expanded details like creator info and time tracking

Returns projects with task counts and total spent time

schema.title: Response Get Projects Api V1 Projects  Get

get.description: Get project by ID with comprehensive statistics and optional detailed lists
Get all tasks for a project
Get all sprints for a project
Get all phases for a project with optional milestone details
Get all users working on a project with their statistics
List phases with optional filtering

schema.title: Response List Phases Api V1 Phases  Get

get.description: Get a specific phase by ID
Get all milestones for a specific phase
Get all tasks with optional filters and expanded details

schema.title: Response Get Tasks Api V1 Tasks  Get

post.description: Create new task (Team leaders can create tasks in their assigned projects)

get.description: Get task by ID with optional expanded details and time logs
Get all subtasks for a task

schema.title: Response Get Task Subtasks Api V1 Tasks  Task Id  Subtasks Get

get.description: Get all sprints with optional project filter

schema.title: Response Get Sprints Api V1 Sprints  Get

get.description: Get a specific sprint by ID
Get all tasks in a sprint

schema.title: Response Get Sprint Tasks Api V1 Sprints  Sprint Id  Tasks Get

post.description: Add multiple tasks to sprint at once

delete.description: Remove multiple tasks from sprint at once

patch.description: Start a sprint (change status from PLANNED to ACTIVE)

get.description: Get sprint statistics and metrics
Get all backlogs with optional project filter

schema.title: Response Get Backlogs Api V1 Backlogs  Get

get.description: Get backlog by ID

post.description: Convert backlog item to task with additional parameters

get.description: Get all bug reports with optional filters

schema.title: Response Get Bug Reports Api V1 Bug Reports  Get

get.description: Get bug report by ID

post.description: Report a problem with a specific task and optionally add to backlog
Report a general problem and optionally add to backlog
Report a simple problem with minimal fields to a user-selected project

get.description: Get all time logs with optional filters including time range

schema.title: Response Get Time Logs Api V1 Time Logs  Get

get.description: Get current user's active timer if any
Get time log by ID
Get all time logs for a specific task

schema.title: Response Get Task Time Logs Api V1 Time Logs Task  Task Id  Get

post.description: Log time for a task with enhanced parameters
Start a live timer for a task
Stop an active timer and create a time log entry

get.description: Get current user's time logs

schema.title: Response Get My Time Logs Api V1 Time Logs User Me Get

get.description: Get all milestones with optional filters

schema.title: Response Get Milestones Api V1 Milestones  Get

get.description: Get milestone by ID
Get all teams with optional filters

schema.title: Response Get Teams Api V1 Teams  Get

post.description: Create a new team with optional project assignment (Admin/Project Manager only)

get.description: Get team by ID

put.description: Update team including members and projects

post.description: Assign team to projects (Admin/Project Manager only)

get.description: Get comprehensive time tracking report
Get story points completion report
Get team productivity report
Get dashboard summary report
Get productivity summary with different time periods

parameters.name: period

schema.description: Period: day, week, month, quarter, year
schema.title: Period

parameters.description: Period: day, week, month, quarter, year

get.description: Get burndown chart data for project or sprint
Export time logs data
Analyze team workload and capacity
Get comprehensive dashboard data for the current user

get.description: Get comprehensive dashboard data for a specific user (with permission checks)

get.description: Get detailed report for a specific project

get.description: Get all versions for a project

get.description: Get a specific version
Get all tags, optionally filtered by category

Get all unique tag categories
